article_title: Plaintiffs' Lawyers Take Aim at GM for Recall
article_text:
Of all the problems haunting General Motors Co. over its handling of defective ignition switches, the one with plaintiffs' lawyers is just beginning.

The company's size and self-confessed failures in an internal report released last week are attracting lawyers who forged some of the biggest civil settlements ever, from the landmark tobacco litigation to the Exxon Valdez disaster to Toyota Motor Corp.'s unintended-acceleration...

twitter.description: General Motors' recall related to defective ignition switches is attracting lawyers who forged some of the biggest civil settlements ever, from the landmark tobacco litigation to the Exxon Valdez.
twitter.title: Plaintiffs' Lawyers Take Aim at GM for Recall

image.alt: Big-name plaintiffs' lawyers are lining up to sue GM over faulty ignition switches.

twitter.creator: @jonesashby
